posts.title: javaå¤šçº¿ç¨‹
posts.text: ç›®å‰æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªçª—å£åŒæ—¶å‡ºå”®20å¼ ç¥¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç”¨javaæ€ä¹ˆå®ç°å‘¢ï¼Ÿ 1.é€šè¿‡ç»§æ‰¿Threadç±» public class Ticket extends Thread{ //ç»§æ‰¿Threadç±» private static int tickets=20; @Override public void run() { while(true){ synchronized (Ticket.class) { //è¿™ä¸€å¥è¯æ˜¯æ ¸å¿ƒï¼Œsynchronizedé”å®šçš„æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡çš„ç±» if (tickets <1) { System.out.println("ç¥¨å–å®Œäº†"); System.exit(0); //æ­£å¸¸é€€å‡ºï¼Œå¦‚æœç”¨breakçš„è¯ï¼Œ } System.out.println("å–å‡ºäº†ç¬¬" + tickets + "å¼ ç¥¨"); tickets--; } } } } å†™æ§åˆ¶å° public class Demo01 { public static void main(String[] args) { Ticket st01 = new Ticket(); Ticket st02 = new Ticket(); Ticket st03 = new Ticket(); st01.start(); st02.start(); st03.start(); } } 2.é€šè¿‡å®ç°runnableæ¥å£ public class Station01 implements Runnable{ private int total = 100; //private int no = total+1; private Object obj = new Object(); @Override public void run() { //æ‰§è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹ while(true) { //ä¸æ–­çš„å¾ªç¯ï¼Œé…åˆä¸‹é¢çš„ifè¯­å¥ä½¿ç”¨ synchronized (this.obj) { //é” if (this.total>0) { //è¿™é‡Œç”¨ifå®Œæˆäº†ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯ï¼Œè‡ªå·±éƒ½å“äº†ä¸€è·³ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ç¡®å®æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çš„ String msg =Thread.currentThread().getName()+" å”®å‡ºç¬¬ "+(this.total) +" å¼ ç¥¨"; System.out.println(msg); this.total--; }else { System.out.println("ç¥¨å·²ç»å–å®Œäº†"); System.exit(0); //æ­£å¸¸çš„é€€å‡ºç¨‹åº } } } } } æ§åˆ¶å° public class Demo02 { public static void main(String[] args) { Station01 demo01 = new Station01(); Thread station1 = new Thread(demo01,"1å·çª—å£"); Thread station2 = new Thread(demo01,"2å·çª—å£"); Thread station3 = new Thread(demo01,"3å·çª—å£"); Thread station4 = new Thread(demo01,"4å·çª—å£"); station1.start(); station2.start(); station3.start(); station4.start(); } }
